Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775)

Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation:
Write "" Write !,"" Do ..WriteTitlePane("@Ensemble:HL7ManagerPropertyPath@Ensemble HL7 Property Path") Write !,"
" Write !,! set tPath=%request.Get("PATH") set ms=%request.Get("MS") set ss=%request.Get("SS") set iField=%request.Get("FIELD") set ds=%request.Get("DS") set dsField=%request.Get("DSFIELD") set ds1=%request.Get("DS1") set ds1Field=%request.Get("DS1FIELD") set category=$p(ms,":",2) set secondary=$p(ms,":",3) If ((category'="")&&(secondary'="")) { set description=..EscapeHTML(##class(EnsLib.HL7.Schema).GetDescription(ms)) if $data(^EnsHL7.Schema(category,"MS",secondary))=0 { write ""_ms_" Definition does not exist!",! quit } } Write !,"
" Write "Path you followed to get to this field:

",! Write "
",! Write " "_(tPath)_"",! Write "

",! Write " " If '($L(dsField)) Goto %csp00001 ;{ Write !," Data Structure  '"_($P(ds,":",2,3))_"', field # "_(dsField)_",
",! Write " " If '($L(ds1Field)) Goto %csp00002 ;{ Write !," Of Data Structure  '"_($P(ds1,":",2,3))_"', field # "_(ds1Field)_",
",! Write " " %csp00002 ;} Write !," " %csp00001 ;} Write !," At Field# "_(iField)_"
",! Write " Of Segment Structure  '"_($P(ss,":",2,3))_"',
",! Write " Of Message Structure  '"_($P(ms,":",2,3))_"'" Write "
" Write !,"

",! Write "

" Write !,"" Write "(Show All Categories)" Write "" Write "
",! Write "" Write "(Show All Message Structures in category '"_(category)_"')" Write "" Write "
",! Write "
" Write !,""

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>Ensemble HL7 Property Path</title>",! Write "<link rel=""stylesheet"" type=""text/css"" href=""/csp/sys/csputils.css"" title=""Standard Style""/>" Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
